testcase.name: To validate SalesIntel application Launching application
To validate SalesIntel application Valid User Username and Valid Password
To Validate Search Box with Company Name in SalesIntel Tab
testcase.system-out: When Check Search Box is displayed in SalesIntel Tab........................passed And Click on Search Box in SalesIntel Tab...................................passed And Enter Company Name in the Search Box....................................passed And Click on Search Button in The SalesIntel Tab............................passed And Click on Companies Tab..................................................passed And Validate the Searched Company Name In Search Result.....................passed

testcase.name: To Validate Search Box with Company Domain in SalesIntel Tab
testcase.system-out: When Click On Clear Button..................................................passed And Click On Do Not Save Button.............................................passed And Check Search Box is displayed in SalesIntel Tab.........................passed And Click on Search Box in SalesIntel Tab...................................passed And Enter Company Domain in the Search Box..................................passed And Click on Search Button in The SalesIntel Tab............................passed And Click on Companies Tab..................................................passed And Validate the Searched Company Domain In Search Result...................passed

testcase.name: To Validate Recommended Lists in SalesIntel Tab
testcase.system-out: When Click On Clear Button..................................................passed And Click On Do Not Save Button.............................................passed And Check Recommended List is displayed in SalesIntel Tab...................passed And Click on first Recommended List.........................................passed Then Validate Search Results for Recommended List...........................passed

testcase.name: To Validate Saved Searches in SalesIntel Tab
testcase.system-out: When Click on Back To Search Result.........................................passed And Click On Clear Button...................................................passed And Click On Do Not Save Button.............................................passed And Click on View all Saved Searches........................................passed And Click On SalesIntel Tab.................................................passed And Check Saved Searches are displayed in SalesIntel Tab....................passed And Click on the First Saved Search in SI tab...............................passed Then Validate Search Result for Saved Searches..............................passed

testcase.name: To validate application scroll Down
testcase.system-out: When Click On Clear Button..................................................passed And Move the SalesIntel Website Screen Down.................................passed

testcase.name: To validate application Upload a file
testcase.system-out: When Click On Browse Button.................................................passed And Upload File From Local Directory........................................passed And Select Contact List Option For Data enrichment..........................passed And Click on Next button....................................................passed And Enter List Name For Data Enrichment.....................................passed And Click on Next button....................................................passed And Click On Save List under Data Enrichment................................passed And Click on Close Button...................................................passed Then Check the Added List in the List Tab...................................passed
